title: Learning Path: Lumen flickering
ai_summary: The user is experiencing flickering artifacts related to Lumen's global illumination and reflections in Unreal Engine 5.
ai_what_you_learn: Increase Lumen Scene Lighting Quality in Project Settings -> Rendering -> Global Illumination to 'High' or 'Epic' to reduce flickering.
Adjust the Final Gather Quality in the Post Process Volume. Higher values reduce flickering but increase performance cost.
Enable 'Surface Cache' in the Lumen settings within your project's rendering settings to stabilize indirect lighting.
Use Nanite geometry where possible, as it provides more accurate surface information for Lumen calculations, reducing artifacts.

steps.title: Step 1: Understand Lumen Fundamentals
steps.description:
Understanding how Lumen works is crucial for troubleshooting flickering issues. This step provides a general overview of the system and its core components.

👉 **Action:** Watch the first part of the 'Lumen in UE5' video to grasp the core concepts.

content.title: Lumen in UE5: Let there be light! | Unreal Engine
content.description:
**Why this helps:** This video introduces Lumen's core functionality and how it achieves real-time global illumination. Understanding the underlying principles is essential for identifying potential causes of flickering.

⏱️ **When to watch:** Start at the beginning and watch until ~5:00 for an overview of Lumen's architecture and capabilities. (5 minutes)

steps.title: Step 2: Diagnose Your Issue
steps.description:
Flickering can stem from various factors, from Lumen settings to scene complexity. This step helps pinpoint the specific cause in your project.

👉 **Action:** Examine your Lumen settings and scene complexity, comparing them to the performance considerations discussed in the video.

steps.title: Step 3: Apply the Fix
steps.description:
Based on your diagnosis, this step guides you on how to adjust Lumen settings and optimize your scene to eliminate flickering.

👉 **Action:** Adjust Lumen settings based on the recommendations in the video, starting with Scene Lighting Quality and Final Gather Quality.

content.title: Optimizing UE5: Advanced Rendering, Graphics Performance, and Memory Management | Unreal Fest 2024
content.description:

⏱️ **When to watch:** Focus on sections related to rendering settings and optimization, especially those concerning Lumen. Start watching around 15:00 for tips on optimizing Lumen settings. (15 minutes)

steps.title: Step 4: Prevent Future Issues
steps.description:

👉 **Action:** Implement the best practices for lighting and scene setup discussed in the video, such as using Nanite geometry and optimizing light sources.
